comments:
[Smoke]Can't create Stored Procedure  and  output parameter[00]
Build number:
2.2.0.v20070508-0630
Steps to reproduce:
1.Add a data source.
Driver:net.sourceforge.jtds.jdbc.Driver (v0.9)
URL:jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://spmdb/gui
User:sa
Password:sa
2.Add a data set.
Select data set type "SQL Stored Procedure Query". 
3.Edit this data set "{call counterInT1(?)} ".
Expected result:
Stored procedure data set can be created
Actual result:
Exception thrown
